alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 18 at 10:53AM MST until January 18 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Northeast Highlands, Eastern San Miguel County, Guadalupe County, and Quay County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on north to south oriented roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
